verses.name: 1 Kings 12:4
verses.text: Thy father made our yoke grievous: now therefore make thou the grievous service of thy father, and his heavy yoke which he put upon us, lighter, and we will serve thee.

verses.name: 1 Kings 12:5
verses.text: And he said unto them, Depart yet for three days, then come again to me. And the people departed.

verses.name: 1 Kings 12:6
verses.text: And king Rehoboam consulted with the old men, that stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, and said, How do ye advise that I may answer this people?
